Characteristics, grouped by function

By Ray Gamer on Sunday, October 7, 2001 - 04:08 pm:

Well, here's a stab at trying to sort the characteristics with what little information I have so far... please note I only sorted the characteristics I am almost positive fit under the catagories liste, the ones I was unsure of found their way to the 'unsure' section. ^_^

Also... THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS AND NOT COMPLETE WHATSOVER

Just want to make sure no one gets confused. Here it is...

Well there it is... what a mess! I most likely won't post anything else here until some real information is discovered (hold your applause please, :P).

It's starting to make a little more sense to me, You can see certain types of characteristics exist.

Ah well, I'll let everyone take in what I've sorted out and form their own opinions I suppose. On with the research!

By Anonymous on Sunday, December 2, 2001 - 07:00 pm:

I've stood by long enough! Where's Intuitive? Description: "You're not telling me something"

It helps block/dodge attacks

By Anxiety on Wednesday, January 2, 2002 - 11:39 pm:

I just found out that Sniper did not pass down. I had a Jell w/ Sniper, Sharp Eyes, Vegetarian, Jell Body & Resists Cold. Only Sharp Eyes and Vegetarian passed down to another monster. I double checked by regen'ing another Jell w/o Sniper since I thought maybe Sniper only passed down to monsters w/ a range attack but it still didn't pass down. I knew things like Radar and Jell Body wouldn't pass, but I am unsure why Sniper is included in that mix. Thought I would pass that info on though.

-Anxiety
